com.samsung.android.sdk.mediacontrol

Interface SmcItem.Resource

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Parcelable
    Enclosing class:
    SmcItem

    public static interface SmcItem.Resource
extends Parcelable
    This interface supports content resource management.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface android.os.Parcelable

        Parcelable.ClassLoaderCreator<T>, Parcelable.Creator<T>

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from interface android.os.Parcelable

        CONTENTS_FILE_DESCRIPTOR, PARCELABLE_WRITE_RETURN_VALUE

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int getBitrate()
      Get the content bit rate in bps.
      long getDuration()
      Get the content duration in seconds.
      long getFileSize()
      Get the content file size in kilobytes.
      int getMediaType()
      Get the content type.
      String getMimeType()
      Get the content MIME type.
      String getResolution()
      Get the content resolution.
      int getSeekMode()
      Get the content seek mode.
      Uri getUri()
      Get the content URI.

      • Methods inherited from interface android.os.Parcelable

        describeContents, writeToParcel

    • Method Detail

      • getMediaType

        int getMediaType()
        Get the content type.
        Returns:
        The content type. The valid values are:
        • SmcItem.MEDIA_TYPE_ITEM_AUDIO
        • SmcItem.MEDIA_TYPE_ITEM_FOLDER
        • SmcItem.MEDIA_TYPE_ITEM_IMAGE
        • SmcItem.MEDIA_TYPE_ITEM_VIDEO
        • SmcItem.MEDIA_TYPE_ITEM_UNKNOWN

      • getSeekMode

        int getSeekMode()
        Get the content seek mode.
        Returns:
        The content seek mode. The valid values are:
        • SmcItem.SEEK_MODE_ANY
        • SmcItem.SEEK_MODE_BYTE
        • SmcItem.SEEK_MODE_NONE
        • SmcItem.SEEK_MODE_TIME
        • SmcItem.SEEK_MODE_UNKNOWN

      • getUri

        Uri getUri()
        Get the content URI.
        Returns:
        The URI of the content. This method returns null if no URI information is available.

      • getDuration

        long getDuration()
        Get the content duration in seconds.
        Returns:
        The content duration in seconds. This method returns -1 if no duration information is available.

      • getResolution

        String getResolution()
        Get the content resolution.

        The resolution format is "width x height".

        Returns:
        The resolution of the content. This method returns an empty string if no resolution information is available.

      • getFileSize

        long getFileSize()
        Get the content file size in kilobytes.
        Returns:
        The file size in kilobytes of the content. This method returns -1 if no file size information is available.

      • getMimeType

        String getMimeType()
        Get the content MIME type.
        Returns:
        The MIME type of the content. This method returns an empty string if no MIME type information is available.

      • getBitrate

        int getBitrate()
        Get the content bit rate in bps.
        Returns:
        The bit rate of the content. This method returns -1 if no bit rate information is available.
